name: Open Option Orders Test
description: Test case for retrieving currently open option orders through agent interaction

parts.text: Show me all my currently pending/open option orders.

Here are your currently open option orders:

**Found * open option orders currently pending**

*

These are all pending options orders that haven't been executed yet, including limit orders for calls and puts, spread orders, and any partially filled contracts. All orders are in your paper trading account.
